snippet.title: Inheritance patterns in citation networks reveal scientific memes
snippet.description: Inheritance patterns in citation networks reveal scientific memes / Kuhn, Tobias ; Perc, Matjaz ; Helbing, Dirk Memes are the cultural equivalent of genes that spread across human culture by means of imitation. [...] arXiv:1404.3757. \- 2014\. - two-column p. Preprint

snippet.title: The next generation of the ATLAS PanDA Monitoring System
snippet.description: The next generation of the ATLAS PanDA Monitoring System / Schovancova, J (Brookhaven National Laboratory) ; De, K (University of Texas in Arlington) ; Klimentov, A (Brookhaven National Laboratory) ; Love, P (Lancaster University) ; Potekhin, M (Brookhaven National Laboratory) ; Wenaus, T (Brookhaven National Laboratory) For many years the PanDA Workload Management System has been the basis for distributed production and analysis for the ATLAS experiment at the LHC. snippet.title: IPAC Image Processing and Data Archiving for the Palomar Transient Factory
snippet.description: IPAC Image Processing and Data Archiving for the Palomar Transient Factory / Laher, Russ R ; Surace, Jason ; Grillmair, Carl J ; Ofek, Eran O ; Levitan, David ; Sesar, Branimir ; van Eyken, Julian C ; Law, Nicholas M ; Helou, George ; Hamam, Nouhad et al. The Palomar Transient Factory (PTF) is a multi-epochal robotic survey of the northern sky that acquires data for the scientific study of transient and variable astrophysical phenomena. [...] arXiv:1404.1953. \- 2014\. - 54 p. Preprint

Third International Conference on Soft Computing for Problem Solving \- SocProS 2013 SocProS 13 26 - 28 Dec 2013 \- Roorkee, India / Pant, Millie (ed.); Deep, Kusum (ed.); Nagar, Atulya (ed.); Bansal, Jagdish (ed.) The present book is based on the research papers presented in the 3rd International Conference on Soft Computing for Problem Solving (SocProS 2013), held as a part of the golden jubilee celebrations of the Saharanpur Campus of IIT Roorkee, at the Noida Campus of Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee, India. This book is divided into two volumes and covers a variety of topics including mathematical modelling, image processing, optimization, swarm intelligence, evolutionary algorithms, fuzzy logic, neural networks, forecasting, medical and health care, data mining etc. [...] New Delhi : Springer, 2014 e-proceedings (v.1) e-proceedings (v.2)

snippet.title: Quality of experience : advanced concepts, applications and methods
snippet.description: Quality of experience : advanced concepts, applications and methods / Möller, Sebastian (ed.) ; Raake, Alexander (ed.) This pioneering book develops definitions and concepts related to Quality of Experience in the context of multimedia- and telecommunications-related applications, systems and services, and applies these to various fields of communication and media technologies [...] Cham : Springer, 2014.

snippet.title: VMware Horizon Workspace essentials
snippet.description: VMware Horizon Workspace essentials / von Oven, Peter This book uses a step-by-step approach to teach you how to design, deploy, and manage a Horizon Workspace based on real world experience [...] Birmingham : Packt Publ., 2014. - 158 p.

snippet.title: Mathematical epidemiology
snippet.description: Mathematical epidemiology / Brauer, Fred (ed.) ; Driessche, Pauline (ed.) ; Wu, Jianhong (ed.) Based on lecture notes of two summer schools with a mixed audience from mathematical sciences, epidemiology and public health, this volume offers a comprehensive introduction to basic ideas and techniques in modeling infectious diseases, for the comparison of strategies to plan for an anticipated ep [...] Berlin : Springer, 2008. (Lecture Notes in Mathematics ; 1945)

snippet.title: A noble cause Une noble cause
snippet.description: A noble cause Une noble cause / Poignant is the word that comes to mind this week, a week in which we lost the last surviving founding father of CERN, François de Rose, and in which the institute he was instrumental in creating 60 years ago made a significant step towards the further construction of science in Europe, as CERN and ESA signed a new agreement. With the passing of François de Rose at the age of 103, we have lost a true pioneer, not only of CERN but also of Europe. [...] BUL-NA-2014-061.- 2014 \- Published in : , no. 14/2014, pp. 2 \- Published in : , no. 15/2014, pp. 2
